title: Greg's No Man's Sky Mariachi Dreams - Kinda Funny Doodles
description:
New episode of Kinda Funny Doodles every Friday! This clip is from Colin and Greg Live 04.14.16!

Subscribe! http://www.youtube.com/kindafunny?sub_confirmation=1

Support us and get the shows early here! http://www.patreon.com/kindafunny

Check out our store! http://www.kindafunny.com/store

Follow us on Twitter!
Greg - http://www.twitter.com/GameOverGreggy
Tim - http://www.twitter.com/TimGettys
Colin - http://www.twitter.com/NoTaxation
Nick - http://www.twitter.com/Nick_Scarpino
Kinda Funny - http://www.twitter.com/KindaFunnyVids

Animated by Zacq Wenzel
From Colin and Greg Live

transcript_chunks.text: what what's your expectation for No Man's Sky is the question that game is crazy I think it's going to be more than what Greg's talking about right now than just landing scanning I mean that's what my my expectations set so if I land SC and then guess what **** Mariachi Mann over there do you want to join yes I do I do I start earning in-game currency I build a house on that planet I sell my ship and I just live there sell all my guns and all of a sudden it's like I'm making so much money in No Man's Sky that I quit this job just to be a prof profal mariachi band guy on whoever found that planet they called the Dickweed or whatever I'm on planet Dickweed and I run this mariachi band that I ran into there sold all my stuff and here I am and people land and they have their guns and they're like oh we heard about you we saw the Kotaku post about you this **** mariachi band guy used to be Greg Miller right and I was like in another life l
